short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An xkcd themed new tab featuring comics from xkcd.com and other cool features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the new tab with an xkcd themed new tab for xkcd comic lovers.

FEATURES:
★ Displays date
★ Displays latest xkcd comic
★ Displays a random xkcd comic
★ Displays a random dad joke
★ Automatically refreshes the new tab to reflect new content
★ Choose between light and dark theme
★ Display news headlines from your country
★ Display latest Google doodle
★ Display your most visited sites
★ Display all your bookmarks
★ Options page to change the settings of this extension

Thanks to xkcd.com for their amazing comics.
